[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@antv/dw-random](./dw-random.md)

## dw-random package

Random generate value

## Example


```javascript
import random from '@antv/dw-random';

const name = random.name();

```
with your own seed

```javascript
import { Random } from '@antv/dw-random';
const random = new Random(200);
console.log(random.phone());

```
extend

```javascript
import { Random } from '@antv/dw-random';
Random.mixin({
 user() {
   return {
     name: this.cname(),
     aget: this.integer({ max: 50, min: 25 })
   }
 }
})

```
